Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.controllers.ViewController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.controllers.GameController
public class GameController extends ViewController
The GameController class handles the interactions and visual representation of the game state in the GUI
